Others: The Indiana Pacers won against the Chicago Bulls with a score of 129-113.
Thomas Bryant, who started for the first time this season due to Myles Turner's illness, had a breakthrough performance with 22 points, 8 rebounds, 2 steals, and 1 assist.
Coach Rick Carlisle praised Bryant's performance, stating that he seemed to always be in the right place at the right time and brought positive energy to the team.
Bryant's teammates, Pascal Siakam and Tyrese Haliburton, also complimented Bryant's performance.
Bryant was equally complimentary of his teammates, giving them credit for accepting him on such short notice.
